coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint wax stamp on the peel reads "Grown by the dragons of the DSG Farmer's Guild."

coreAttributes.description: Fruit from a carefully cultivated highland apple tree. The peel has a glossy shine to it, as if it had been polished.
